method: In a large bowl, combine the chopped cactus and mixed greens.
In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lime juice, honey, Dijon mustard, salt, and pepper to make the citrus dressing.
Pour the dressing over the cactus and mixed greens, and toss to coat.
Add the cherry tomatoes, red onion, and feta cheese to the bowl, and gently toss to combine.
Enjoy your Cactus Salad with Citrus Dressing!
